detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pointelle vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes, and a small satin bow at the front.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a taped zip at the front and an elasticated hem. Medium support.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.

Full-length, V-neck dress in heavily draping jersey with a slight sheen. Long shoulder straps that can be tied in various ways, elastication at the back of the waist and a raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Hipster briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides with elastic crossover straps and medium coverage at the back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short swim top in fast-drying functional fabric with long, printed raglan sleeves and an elasticated hem. Lined front and back.
Vest tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Satin-covered Alice band with glittery decorations in the shape of ears and bat wings.
Sleeveless playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and short legs.
Long-sleeved shirt in a checked cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a patterned weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and low crotch. Side pockets, fake back pockets, and straight legs with creases.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Playsuit in a cotton weave with a collar, concealed button placket, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Slides with wide imitation leather straps over the foot. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Earrings in embossed metal with square pendants. Length approx. 4 cm.
Hair clips in various designs. One in glittery plastic and three decorated with plastic rhinestones.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a lace trim at the hem.
Shirt dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar with press-studs, a zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Appliqué on one sleeve, an adjustable tab and press-studs at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a boat neck and gathers at the sides for best fit.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and V-shaped opening. Unlined.
Hair elastics decorated with faux fur pompoms.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.5 cm.
Calf-length slip dress in satin with a draped neckline, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a slit in one side. Unlined.

Soft, padded nursing bras in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with opening, jersey-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with a soft fleece lining, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Glasses case in imitation leather with an imitation suede lining. Flap with a reinforced front and press-stud fastening. Size 6x16 cm.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a chest pocket.

Calf-length shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathers at the front and elastication at the back, and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Non-padded, underwired bras in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved tops in soft pointelle with a contrasting colour lace trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Long-sleeved body in a soft, gently draping jersey and silk blend with a deep neckline front and back and lined gusset with press-studs.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Boxy polo shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, press-studs at the top, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with wide shoulder straps, press-studs at the top, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shortie briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Bolero in a loose cotton knit with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a ribbed edge around the opening. No fasteners.
Mesh trainers with glittery sections and imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in patterned organic slub cotton jersey with buttons at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam at the waist with gathers for added width. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on the top and a turn-up at the hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Short wrap dress in soft jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend with a V-neck and ties at one side. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Flared dress in glittery tulle with a round, satin-trimmed, gathered neckline. Opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounced sleeves. Underdress with a print motif at the hem.
Metal chain necklace with a round pendant.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and a wrapover hood. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Cropped cardigan in soft, rib-knit wool blend with a wide V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Length 5 cm.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Large scarf in a supersoft weave with long fringes on the short sides.
Set with six metal hair clips and 20 hair elastics without metal clips. Size of hair clips 4 cm.
Top in soft jersey with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbed trims. Gathers in the sides for best fit.

Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-10Y) and a straight-cut hem. For the matching parent’s T-shirt, look for 0721930.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.

Short dress in a linen and viscose weave with decorative lace trims. V-neck, a concealed zip at the back and long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and drawstring down the front that ties at the hem.
